about_the_game:
"99% sweetness × 1% surprise"!? A yuri novel game that you'll fall in love with at first sight.

The wheels of fate begin to turn.

The girls meet, fall in love, and deepen their bonds.

"Hey, do you know the meaning of the four-leaf clover?"

Set at "Shonan Saika Academy," a prestigious school in Shonan, Kanagawa Prefecture, this is a youthful story of girls wavering between friendship and love.

Shonan Saika Academy, a high-achieving all-girls school in Kanagawa Prefecture.

One day, Marin Tachibana, along with her best friends Mashiro Saotome and Kiyoka Jinguji, experiences a special day.

It begins with meeting an unusual new transfer student, Shizuku Kujyo.

A beautiful girl with a calm and dignified demeanor.

Meeting her feels like déjà vu...

While showing her around the school, they stop by an observation deck, where Marin finds a four-leaf clover.

There is a tradition at this school:

If you press a four-leaf clover found on the observation deck into your student notebook, your wish will come true.

(I want to get closer to her. To spend more time with her...)

With this wish, Marin gives Shizuku the "coincidental" four-leaf clover she found.

This act becomes a turning point, bringing Marin and Shizuku closer together with the help of Mashiro and Kiyoka. However...

"Please, stop worrying about me. I don't want to just be protected..."

"Shizuku, we're friends, right?"

A storm threatens to tear them apart.

It is deeply tied to a "secret" Shizuku is hiding and a "trauma" from Marin's past.

The story follows the growth, mutual support, and cherished memories of the four girls.

Will Marin and the others find their personal "clover" (happiness)?

Gentle and healing girl

Marin Tachibana (立花 茉鈴)

CV: Saho Shirasuna

(Featured in: *The Detective Is Already Dead* - Charlotte Arisaka Anderson, *Summertime Render* - Mio Kobune, *Blue Archive* - Tsubaki Kasuga, *Atelier Resleriana* - Resna Sternenricht, etc.)

Age: 16 (at the time of appearance)

Birthday: March 14

Blood Type: O

"It's so fun to be with everyone."

Reserved and quiet, she has trouble expressing her own opinions. Gentle and warm-hearted.

With a cute, girly demeanor, her friends often dote on her.

Talented in art, she dreams of attending an art university. Though she is taking lessons from the art club teacher, she's unsure if she should also attend prep school.

Meeting Shizuku sparks a change in something within her.

♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧

Cool and beautiful girl

Shizuku Kujyo (九条 しずく)

CV: Yuki Takada

(Featured in: *Aikatsu!* - Rin Kurosawa, *New Game!* - Aoba Suzukaze, *Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid* - Elma, *Idolmaster Cinderella Girls* - Yoshino Yorita, *Honkai: Star Rail* - Tingyun, *Blue Archive* - Midori Saiba, etc.)

Age: 16 (at the time of appearance)

Birthday: June 25

Blood Type: B

"...I'm not good at this kind of thing, but if it's with Marin, then... fine."

Perceived as cool and intelligent, but struggles with expressing her emotions, which leads to that impression.

Determined and diligent, she approaches tasks with seriousness and dedication.

Though she has no fixed plans for her future, she aims to live independently through hard work.

After transferring, she harbors complex feelings toward Marin, whom she has just met yet feels strangely familiar.

Usually calm and composed, her emotions become more intense when it comes to Marin.

♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧

Bright and cheerful mood-maker

Mashiro Saotome (早乙女 真白)

CV: Yuki Kuwahara

(Featured in: *Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid* - Doll, *Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest* - Yue, *The Day I Became a God* - Sora Narukami, *Tokyo 7th Sisters* - Harumi Shinju, etc.)

Age: 17 (at the time of appearance)

Birthday: October 31

Blood Type: AB

"Let's all go karaoke! Kiyo-chi, you're coming too, no excuses!"

Always positive and a cheerful mood-maker.

Her mere presence energizes those around her.

A nurturing type who can't leave those in need or distress alone.

Dreams of attending a fashion vocational school after high school but worries about balancing family responsibilities.

Became fast friends with Marin in high school. Mashiro describes Marin as a "delicate beauty who awakens my protective instincts."

♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧♧

Caring older-sister type

Kiyoka Jinguji (神宮寺 清香)

CV: Noriko Shibasaki

(Featured in: *Idolmaster Shiny Colors* - Chiyuki Kuwayama, *Tsugumomo* - Chisato Chikami, *Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest* - Liliana S. B. Heiligh, *Cinderella Nine in August* - Shizuku Tsukahara, etc.)

Age: 17 (at the time of appearance)

Birthday: April 2

Blood Type: A

"It's violin practice day, so I'm heading home now."

A natural leader who excels academically and athletically. With her broad perspective, she often appears wise beyond her years.

Though she seems strict, her endearing traits, like a fear of bugs or ghosts, occasionally surface.

Loves music and dreams of becoming a composer, though her parents oppose the idea. Determined to convince them, she works hard to achieve her goal.

Childhood friends with Mashiro, whom she views as a younger sister and has always protected.

Admired as an older-sister figure, though she isn't fully aware of it.

Dynamic Character Expressions System

Express characters' emotions in greater variety!

Enhance immersion!

Project & Concept: vividX

Character Design & Original Art: Kukiha

Scenario: Mao Kahoku

Background Art: Wayu Kaneko / Cheeser

Design: Yunoki Hanamori

Music: Shoichiro Toko

Music, Lyrics, Arrangement: Shoichiro Toko

Vocals: Saho Shirasuna (as Marin Tachibana)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
